summary: This is an email chain from March 2020 discussing a potential interview with a woman whose summer camp tuition was paid by Jeffrey Epstein. The FBI agents are coordinating to contact her, referencing records from Interlochen and a podcast interview where she discussed her dealings with Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who paid the summer camp tuition for a student at Interlochen.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Epstein; the student discussed her dealings with both Maxwell and Epstein in a podcast interview.

connections.description: Both are mentioned together in the context of a student's dealings with them, as discussed in a podcast.
Epstein paid the summer camp tuition for the student at Interlochen.
The student discussed her dealings with Maxwell in a podcast interview.

events.title: Podcast Interview Shared
events.description: A copy of a podcast interview with a student about her dealings with Maxwell and Epstein was texted to someone in January 2020.

events.title: FBI Coordination on Interview
events.description: FBI agents discuss reaching out to interview a student whose camp tuition was paid by Epstein, referencing Interlochen records and a podcast.

events.title: Agent Travel to Aruba
events.description: An FBI agent mentions being at the airport headed to Aruba and will be out of phone contact until the following Sunday.

locations: Interlochen (likely Interlochen Center for the Arts, a summer camp)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein paid the summer camp tuition for a student at Interlochen.
The student was interviewed on a podcast about her dealings with Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
FBI agents in March 2020 were actively seeking to interview this student as part of their investigation.
One agent was traveling to Aruba and would be out of contact, indicating the ongoing, active nature of the investigation.
